name: [DLC] Reanimation Scheme - Wallpaper Pack
description:
This is a DLC for the otome game in development, Reanimation Scheme. It contains 6  HD wallpapers, 1 of each  main character! Each wallpaper  is 1920x1080, which should be suitable for 16:9 desktops.

A preview of what the wallpapers look like: 

They look great when cropped to use as phone wallpapers too!

---

For the actual game itself, Reanimation Scheme, please click the image below to visit the game's project page!
